sentence.Network_en: Crass's fat face was pallid with fear as he clung tremblingly to his seat.
sentence.Network_cn: 克拉斯死抱着座位发抖,他那肥胖的脸吓得铁青.

sentence.Network_en: Thus, it was almost tremblingly that she resumed her lover's arm.
sentence.Network_cn: 所以当她重新挽起她情人的臂膀的时候, 她几乎有点发抖了.

sentence.Network_en: Morrel rose tremblingly, supporting himself by the arm of the chair.
sentence.Network_cn: 莫雷尔用手撑着椅背,颤巍巍地站起来.

trembling 震动, tremblingly 发抖地, tremblingill 肌肉搐搦病

list.exp: 还冷冷挂在颤抖的唇际
list.abs: 诗歌最后的音节 The last syllable of the poem还冷冷挂在颤抖的唇际 Leaves the lips tremblingly独自走向今天的世界 This day I walk alone

auth_sentence.content: For the third most-capped player in Welsh rugby union history, the Dancing On Ice dream is still tremblingly alive.
